mapper.select: select b.brdno, b.brdcontent, b.wrdate, b.userid, b.title, b.brdtype, b.userno, a.abrdno from board b join adpboardinfo a on b.brdno=a.brdno where b.brdtype='ab' order by a.abrdno desc
SELECT * FROM board b JOIN fboardinfo f ON b.brdno = f.brdno WHERE b.brdtype='fb' order by b.brdno desc limit #{value}, 10
select count(*) from board where board.brdtype='fb'
select b.brdno, b.brdcontent, b.wrdate, b.userid, b.title, b.brdtype, b.userno, f.fbrdno, f.floc from board b join fboardinfo f on b.brdno=f.brdno where b.brdtype='fb' order by f.fbrdno desc
mapper.insert: insert into mboardinfo(brdno, mloc, mdate, mcontact, mkind, mgender, mage, mname) values(#{brdno}, #{mloc}, #{mdate}, #{mcontact}, #{mkind}, #{mgender}, #{mage}, #{mname})
mapper.select: select b.brdno, b.brdcontent, b.wrdate, b.userid, b.title, b.brdtype, b.userno, m.mbrdno, m.mloc, m.mdate, m.mcontact, m.mkind, m.mgender, m.mage, m.mname from board b join mboardinfo m on b.brdno=m.brdno where b.brdtype='mb' order by m.mbrdno desc
